item.description:
"Ballroom in Boston" is having an open house /dance on Valentine's Day (2/14 6-10pm). The event is free!

If you're interested in Ballroom Dancing or looking for something to do Valentine's Day, this may be for you. No partner needed. If you have a partner, all the better.

Introductory group class every hour.

Professional demonstrations

Caricature artist & Massage therapist.

Formation team demonstration

Raffle throughout the evening.

Special package just for guests.

Address is 217 California Street, Floor 2, Newton, MA 02458 (next to McDonalds; near Watertown Sq)

http://www.ballroomin...
item.name: Valentine's Day dance
